item.description: Friday, December 9th will be a Songwriters Session -- this usually features multiple artists who perform in this lovely, folky cafe setting.The show itself begins at 7.30, but we should get there ahead to get a table, chat, and grab something to eat and drink before the music begins. There is a cover charge which ranges between five and fifteen dollars, depending on the show. When it's posted I'll add it here.For directions and more info about the Bean, here's their websitehttp://www.thevanillabeancafe.com

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Vanilla Bean
